TrainingElement.Name: Multi Select
TrainingElement.Title: Multi Select
TrainingElement.BodyCopy:
The Multi Select element is used to select components or web pages to be used for content within the web page that contains the Multi Select.

   The Multi Select has a predefined folder located within the CMS tree where components or web pages can be placed inside. All items within the folder are visible to the multi select element.

 

Please take note:

   Other folders cannot replace the folders being used by Multi Selects.
In order to reassign a new folder the user will need to call web services to have them make a manual change within content files. If you need to create a new page that uses a multi select, please contact web services for help.

 

Select

   Click on the select button to select items for use.

A window will display showing available items on the left, and items currently in use on the right. By selecting items and using the center arrows, a user can choose what items can be used for the web page.
